projects.title: Bookstore Project
projects.description:
The MERN stack book store project with Stripe and JWT integration provides a modern, secure, and user-friendly online shopping experience for books. Users can search, purchase, and track their orders with ease.
 With Stripe and JWT, the application provides a secure payment process and user authentication

projects.title: Car rental Project
projects.description:
The car rental project using MERN stack and Stripe integration allows users to rent cars securely online. It provides a user-friendly interface with search, sort, and filter options for easy car selection.
 Users can make payments for their rentals with Stripe integration. The project uses MongoDB for data storage, Express.js for backend, React.js for frontend, and Node.js for server-side programming.
